name: Helen Keller in the Zombie Apocalypse
name_original: Helen Keller in the Zombie Apocalypse
description: The zombie apocalypse has come and only one soul is brave enough to take on the hoards and her name is Helen Keller.  If you want to beat this game, KNOW YOUR HERO!  I made this game, start to finish in about 12 hours just for laugh.  So don’t take it too seriously.  Happy April Fools!  Enjoy the game!  Feel free to stream this game if you’d like as well.  I own the rights to the music, so you won’t get claimed on.
